quote: For a long time, Maurice rubbed his shaved head in his palm, until at last he looked up at his student. ""Teo, I think you have to let Deu be the God he is, not the god you want him to be.
quote_letters: FOR A LONG TIME MAURICE RUBBED HIS SHAVED HEAD IN HIS PALM UNTIL AT LAST HE LOOKED UP AT HIS STUDENT TEO I THINK YOU HAVE TO LET DEU BE THE GOD HE IS NOT THE GOD YOU WANT HIM TO BE
